data.title: Original score by Pierre
data.meta_description: All the tracks of the album L'espion de Mao - Original score by Pierre-André Athané. This documentary tells the incredible story of Bernard Boursicot, a French diplomat in love with a Beijing Opera star, became a spy working for the PRC. The soundtrack of Pierre-André Athané revises the codes of the vintage spy movies and the romantic Chinese melodies.
